steps.title: Measure and mark wall
steps.description: Use a level and tape measure to mark the desired height and placement of shelves on the wall. Mark stud locations with painter's tape.

steps.title: Install shelf brackets
steps.description: Drill pilot holes at marked locations and secure brackets to wall studs using appropriate screws. Ensure brackets are level.

steps.title: Attach shelves
steps.description: Slide shelf boards onto installed brackets and secure with set screws or mounting hardware provided.
